Related repos

  • Code LLM that curates its own training data
  • Language model for theorem proving via subgoal decomposition
  • zkML framework for proving AI model inferences with zero-knowledge proofs

  • Nexus zkVM for verifiable computation
  • Signs Bitcoin transactions with a Raspberry Pi Zero
